channel.title: Ludovico-Silva on Noah Mazer

item.title: Ludovico Silva - Yesterday I Saw a Camel Go By
item.description: [Ayer Vi Pasar Un Camello] Yesterday I saw a camel, drunk, carrying a book and cursing pass by my window. And I would’ve been shocked if, after the camel, a man hadn’t passed by all starched and happy on his way to work.
